     924              : 
     925          103 :   shopts.node                                = node_;
     926          103 :   shopts.no_message_timeout                  = mrs_lib::no_timeout;
     927          103 :   shopts.threadsafe                          = true;
     928          103 :   shopts.autostart                           = true;

     935          103 :   timer_preinitialization_->cancel();

    2150        20060 : void ControlManager::timerStatus() {
    2151              : 
    2152        20060 :   if (!is_initialized_) {
    2153            0 :     return;
    2154              :   }
    2155              : 
    2156        20060 :   mrs_lib::Routine    profiler_routine = profiler_.createRoutine("timerStatus");

    2160        20060 :   auto uav_state             = mrs_lib::get_mutexed(mutex_uav_state_, uav_state_);

    2216        20060 :       tilt_error_out.value           = (180.0 / M_PI) * tilt_error_.value();

    2219        20060 :     }

    2221              :

    2234              :

    2237        15020 :     msg_out.position_errors.z    = pos_error_value(2);
    2238        15020 :     msg_out.total_position_error = pos_error_value.norm();

    2247              :

    2280        17831 :       heading_out.value  = heading;
    2281              : 
    2282        17831 :       ph_heading_.publish(heading_out);
    2283        17831 :     }
    2284            0 :     catch (...) {
    2285            0 :       RCLCPP_ERROR_THROTTLE(node_->get_logger(), *clock_, 1000, "exception caught, could not transform heading");
    2286            0 :     }
    2287              :   }
    2288              : 
    2289              :   // --------------------------------------------------------------
    2290              :   // |                  publish the current speed                 |
    2291              :   // --------------------------------------------------------------
    2292              : 
    2293        20060 :   if (_state_input_ == INPUT_UAV_STATE && sh_uav_state_.hasMsg()) {
    2294              : 
    2295        17831 :     double speed = sqrt(pow(uav_state.velocity.linear.x, 2) + pow(uav_state.velocity.linear.y, 2) + pow(uav_state.velocity.linear.z, 2));
    2296              : 
    2297        17831 :     mrs_msgs::msg::Float64Stamped speed_out;

    6010            0 :       return std::tuple(false, ss.str());
    6011              :

    6897        15848 : double ControlManager::getMaxZ(const std::string& frame_id) {
    6898              : 
    6899              :   // | ------- first, calculate max_z from the safety area ------ |
    6900              : 
    6901        15848 :   double safety_area_max_z = std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
    6902              :

    6904              : 
    6905        15848 :     geometry_msgs::msg::PointStamped point;
    6906              : 
    6907        15848 :     point.header.frame_id = _safety_area_vertical_frame_;

    6909        15848 :     point.point.y         = 0;
    6910        15848 :     point.point.z         = _safety_area_max_z_;

    6912        15848 :     auto ret = transformer_->transformSingle(point, frame_id);
    6913              :

    6916              :     }
    6917              : 
    6918        15848 :     safety_area_max_z = ret->point.z;
    6919        15848 :   }
    6920              : 
    6921              :   // | ------------ overwrite from estimation manager ----------- |
    6922              : 
    6923        15848 :   double estimation_manager_max_z = std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
    6924              : 
    6925        15848 :   {
    6926              :     // if possible, override it with max z from the estimation manager
    6927        15848 :     if (sh_max_z_.hasMsg()) {
    6928              :

    6930              :

    6932        15785 :       geometry_msgs::msg::PointStamped point;

    6935        15785 :       point.point.y = 0;

    7234              : /* bumperGetSectorId() //{ */
    7235              : 
    7236          218 : int ControlManager::bumperGetSectorId(const double& x, const double& y, [[maybe_unused]] const double& z) {
    7237              : 
    7238              :   // copy member variables
    7239          218 :   auto bumper_data = sh_bumper_.getMsg();
    7240              : 
    7241              :   // heading of the point in drone frame
    7242          218 :   double point_heading_horizontal = atan2(y, x);
    7243              : 
    7244          218 :   point_heading_horizontal += TAU;
    7245              : 
    7246              :   // if point_heading_horizontal is greater then 2*M_PI mod it
    7247          218 :   if (fabs(point_heading_horizontal) >= TAU) {
    7248          218 :     point_heading_horizontal = fmod(point_heading_horizontal, TAU);
    7249              :   }
    7250              : 
    7251              :   // heading of the right edge of the first sector
    7252          218 :   double sector_size = TAU / double(bumper_data->n_horizontal_sectors);
    7253              : 
    7254              :   // calculate the idx
    7255          218 :   int idx = floor((point_heading_horizontal + (sector_size / 2.0)) / sector_size);
    7256              : 
    7257          218 :   if (idx > int(bumper_data->n_horizontal_sectors) - 1) {
    7258            0 :     idx -= bumper_data->n_horizontal_sectors;
    7259              :   }
    7260              : 
    7261          218 :   return idx;
    7262          218 : }
    7263              :

    7940              : /* arming() //{ */
    7941              : 
    7942           18 : std::tuple<bool, std::string> ControlManager::arming(const bool input) {
    7943              : 
    7944           18 :   std::stringstream ss;
    7945              : 
    7946           18 :   if (input) {
    7947              : 
    7948            0 :     ss << "not allowed to arm using the ControlManager, maybe later when we don't do bugs";
    7949            0 :     RCLCPP_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE(node_->get_logger(), *clock_, 1000, "[ControlManager]: " << ss.str());
    7950            0 :     return std::tuple(false, ss.str());
    7951              :   }
    7952              : 
    7953           18 :   if (!input && !isOffboard()) {
    7954              : 
    7955            0 :     ss << "can not disarm, not in OFFBOARD mode";
    7956            0 :     RCLCPP_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE(node_->get_logger(), *clock_, 1000, "[ControlManager]: " << ss.str());
    7957            0 :     return std::tuple(false, ss.str());
    7958              :   }
    7959              : 
    7960           18 :   if (!input && _rc_emergency_handoff_) {
    7961              : 
    7962            0 :     toggleOutput(false);
    7963              : 
    7964            0 :     return std::tuple(true, "RC emergency handoff is ON, disabling output");
    7965              :   }
    7966              : 
    7967           18 :   std::shared_ptr<std_srvs::srv::SetBool::Request> request = std::make_shared<std_srvs::srv::SetBool::Request>();
    7968              : 
    7969           18 :   request->data = input ? 1 : 0;  // arm or disarm?
    7970              : 
    7971           54 :   RCLCPP_INFO(node_->get_logger(), "calling for %s", input ? "arming" : "disarming");
    7972              : 
    7973           18 :   auto response = sch_arming_.callSync(request);
    7974              : 
    7975           18 :   if (response) {
    7976              : 
    7977           18 :     if (response.value()->success) {
    7978              : 
    7979           18 :       ss << "service call for " << (input ? "arming" : "disarming") << " was successful";
    7980           90 :       RCLCPP_INFO_STREAM_THROTTLE(node_->get_logger(), *clock_, 1000, "[ControlManager]: " << ss.str());
    7981              : 
    7982           18 :       if (!input) {
    7983              :

    8848              : /* publishControlReferenceOdom() //{ */
    8849              : 
    8850       184366 : void ControlManager::publishControlReferenceOdom(const std::optional<mrs_msgs::msg::TrackerCommand>& tracker_command, const Controller::ControlOutput& control_output) {
    8851              : 
    8852       184366 :   if (!tracker_command || !control_output.control_output) {
    8853        32844 :     return;
    8854              :   }
    8855              : 
    8856       151522 :   auto uav_state = mrs_lib::get_mutexed(mutex_uav_state_, uav_state_);
    8857              : 
    8858       151522 :   nav_msgs::msg::Odometry msg;
    8859              : 
    8860       151522 :   msg.header = tracker_command->header;
    8861              : 
    8862       151522 :   if (tracker_command->use_position_horizontal) {
    8863       151522 :     msg.pose.pose.position.x = tracker_command->position.x;
    8864       151522 :     msg.pose.pose.position.y = tracker_command->position.y;
    8865              :   } else {
    8866            0 :     msg.pose.pose.position.x = uav_state.pose.position.x;
    8867            0 :     msg.pose.pose.position.y = uav_state.pose.position.y;
    8868              :   }
    8869              : 
    8870       151522 :   if (tracker_command->use_position_vertical) {
    8871       151522 :     msg.pose.pose.position.z = tracker_command->position.z;
    8872              :   } else {
    8873            0 :     msg.pose.pose.position.z = uav_state.pose.position.z;
    8874              :   }
    8875              : 
    8876              :   // transform the velocity in the reference to the child_frame
    8877       151522 :   if (tracker_command->use_velocity_horizontal || tracker_command->use_velocity_vertical) {
    8878              : 
    8879       151522 :     msg.child_frame_id = _uav_name_ + "/" + _body_frame_;
    8880              : 
    8881       151522 :     geometry_msgs::msg::Vector3Stamped velocity;
    8882       151522 :     velocity.header = tracker_command->header;
    8883              : 
    8884       151522 :     if (tracker_command->use_velocity_horizontal) {
    8885       151522 :       velocity.vector.x = tracker_command->velocity.x;
    8886       151522 :       velocity.vector.y = tracker_command->velocity.y;
    8887              :     }
    8888              : 
    8889       151522 :     if (tracker_command->use_velocity_vertical) {
    8890       151522 :       velocity.vector.z = tracker_command->velocity.z;
    8891              :     }
    8892              : 
    8893       151522 :     auto res = transformer_->transformSingle(velocity, msg.child_frame_id);
    8894              : 
    8895       151522 :     if (res) {
    8896       151522 :       msg.twist.twist.linear.x = res.value().vector.x;
    8897       151522 :       msg.twist.twist.linear.y = res.value().vector.y;
    8898       151522 :       msg.twist.twist.linear.z = res.value().vector.z;
    8899              :     } else {
    8900       151522 :       RCLCPP_ERROR_THROTTLE(node_->get_logger(), *clock_, 1000, "[ControlManager]: could not transform the reference speed from '%s' to '%s'", velocity.header.frame_id.c_str(), msg.child_frame_id.c_str());
    8901              :     }
    8902       151522 :   }
    8903              : 
    8904              :   // fill in the orientation or heading
    8905       151522 :   if (control_output.desired_orientation) {
